title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of SmartFarmingDrones system, including hardware, software, and communication protocols.

title: Develop Autonomous Navigation System
description: Create an autonomous navigation system for drones that can map fields and fly over them efficiently. The system should take into account the field size, terrain, crop type, and weather conditions.

title: Implement Crop Health Monitoring Sensors
description: Design and integrate sensors into the drones to monitor crop health parameters such as moisture, temperature, color, and light intensity. This includes selecting appropriate sensors for each parameter, configuring them for optimal performance, and interfacing with the main drone system.

title: Optimize Resource Allocation Algorithms in SmartFarmingDrones
description: Develop algorithms to optimize resource use in agriculture based on the collected crop health data. The goal is to ensure efficient and optimal utilization of resources to maximize crop yield.

title: Create User Interface for Data Visualization (with modifications)
description: Design an intuitive and responsive interface to visualize the collected crop health data, optimized resource allocation, and provide insights on overall farm performance. The UI should be user-friendly and able to handle large datasets efficiently.

title: Develop Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive plan to ensure the quality of the SmartFarmingDrones system throughout its development. The plan should cover all aspects, including functional and non-functional testing, performance benchmarking, and code reviews.

title: Perform Security Audit of the System
description: Conduct a thorough security audit to ensure the SmartFarmingDrones system is secure against potential vulnerabilities.
